WorkItem.ClosedComment: The procs are still off but I am not going to fix this unless they add similar procs in Cata.
WorkItem.Description:
I am using the latest source from SVN and for armor I generally agree with the rogue model.
 
However using the optimizer I get some very strange results. The Onyxia weapons are not just a little bit better, but has an upgrade score of more than twice than the second best (ICC Weapons). I have looked and looked at the weapons and can't imagine how it can be.
 
I will attach my character and the upgrade list to this message. (Obviously my rogue got pretty crap gear, but still the upgrades look suspicious to me)

Comments.Message:
Sorry, noticed the upgrade list is almost 6 MB and there is a 4MB limit here. I put it up on this site:

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KEJVBMFJ
The modeling of the proc is completely wrong (the damage it does is added as DPS atm), I'm going to look into this.
